DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to better characterize the fluctuations in multiple sclerosis symptoms and their relationship to medications, to length/extent of disease, and to a variety of physiologic measures.
DOC.brief_title: MS Mosaic: A Longitudinal Research Study on Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Be at least 18 years old Live in the United States of America Read/write in English
